title: Prospect by IrisVR
description: Prospect by IrisVR was made for immersive design review and collaboration in virtual reality with the HTC Vive or Oculus Rift. It is used by BIM and VDC teams, design firms, and engineers who coordinate 3D models and implement design and construction processes. It's compatible with SketchUp, Revit, Navisworks, Rhino, FBX, OBJ, and more.
